```{r}

# Loading in packages
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(rstanarm, # for stan_glm
               lme4) # for lmer

```


```{r}

# est. parameters
x <- runif(100, min = 0, max = 20) # predictors from uniform dist.
error <- rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 5) # error from normal dist.
y <-  2 + 3 * x + error

# lm regression
lmer(y ~ x | error)

# bayesian lm regression
stan_glm(y ~ x)
?stan_glm

```
